Tableau Public is free version of Tableau Desktop

### Step 1 : Download and Install Tableau Public Software (using executable file)

 - Go To: https://public.tableau.com/en-us/s/download

 - Or, search for "Download Tableau Public"


### Step 2 : Create a Profile on Tableau Public Website

#### Why create a profile on Tableau Public ?

 - One limitation of Tableau Public is that you can't save Tableau Workbook locally
 - Save and store your visualizations on your Tableau Public profile. They give you 10GB of space. 

Just make sure you are not sharing sensitive or confidential data
